00020 /**
00021  * @file   chp-to-txt-test.cpp
00022  * @brief  Program for doing tests on chp-to-txt.
00023  */
00024 #include "util/Fs.h"
00025 #include "util/FsTestDir.h"
00026 #include "util/MixedFileCheck.h"
00027 #include "util/RegressionTest.h"
00028 #include "util/Util.h"
00029 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00030 //
00031 #include <cstring>
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <vector>
00034 //
00035 
00036 using namespace std;
00037 
00038 class ChpToTxtTest
00039 {
00040 
00041 public:
00042   int numPassed, numFailed;
00043   std::string testDir;
00044   ChpToTxtTest()
00045   {
00046     numPassed = 0;
00047     numFailed = 0;
00048   }
00049   void doTest(string name, string file, string cdf = "");
00050   void doBadChipTypeTest(string name, string file, string cdf);
00051 
00052 private:
00053   string errorMsg;
00054 };
00055 
00056 void ChpToTxtTest::doTest(string name, string file, string cdf)
00057 {
00058   string command = "./apt-chp-to-txt -out-dir " + testDir + "/" + name + " ../../../regression-data/data/util/chp-to-txt/chp/" + file;
00059   if(cdf != "")
00060       command += " --cdf-file " + cdf;
00061   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00062   checks.push_back(new MixedFileCheck(Fs::join(testDir,name,file + ".txt"),
00063                                       Fs::join("../../../regression-data/data/util/chp-to-txt",name,file + ".txt"),
00064                                       0.00001, 0,0));
00065   RegressionTest test (name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00066   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing doTest(" + name + ", " + file + ")");
00067   if (!test.pass())
00068   {
00069     Verbose::out (1, "Error in ChpToTxtTest::doTest(" + name + ", " + file + "): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00070     ++numFailed;
00071   } else
00072       ++numPassed;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void ChpToTxtTest::doBadChipTypeTest(string name, string file, string cdf)
00076 {
00077   string command = "./apt-chp-to-txt -v -1 -out-dir " + testDir + "/" + name + " ../../../regression-data/data/util/chp-to-txt/chp/" + file + " --cdf-file " + cdf;
00078   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00079   RegressionTest test (name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00080   test.m_NegTest = true;
00081   Verbose::out (1, "\nDoing doTest(" + name + ", " + file + ")");
00082   if (test.pass())
00083   {
00084     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00085     ++numPassed;
00086   } else {
00087     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00088     Verbose::out (1, "Error in ChpToTxtTest::doTest(" + name + ", " + file + "): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00089     Verbose::out (1, "SHOULD HAVE FAILED!!!");
00090     ++numFailed;
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 int main (int argc, char* argv[])
00095 {
00096   try {
00097     FsTestDir testDir;
00098     testDir.setTestDir("util/chp-to-txt",true);
00099           
00100     ChpToTxtTest test;
00101     test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00102     
00103     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00104 
00105     // checks include CDF file
00106     test.doTest("doCdfXdaGenoMpam","Mapping10K_Xba131.xda.genotyping.mpam.chp", "../../../regression-data/data/lib/Mapping10K_Xba131/Mapping10K_Xba131.CDF");
00107     test.doTest("doCdfXdaGenoBrlmm","Mapping250K_Sty.xda.genotyping.brlmm.chp", "../../../regression-data/data/lib/Mapping250K_Sty/Mapping250K_Sty.cdf");
00108     test.doTest("doCdfXdaGenoDm","Mapping50K_Hind240.xda.genotyping.dm.chp", "../../../regression-data/data/lib/Mapping50K_Hind240/Mapping50K_Hind240.cdf");
00109     test.doTest("doCdfXdaExpMas5","HG-U133_Plus_2.xda.expression.mas5.chp", "../../../regression-data/data/lib/HG-U133_Plus_2/HG-U133_Plus_2.cdf");
00110 
00111     // regression test to ensure that chip type mismatch will fail
00112     Fs::fileCopy("../../../regression-data/data/lib/Mapping10K_Xba131/Mapping10K_Xba131.CDF",test.testDir + "/foo.CDF");
00113 
00114     test.doBadChipTypeTest("doCdfXdaGenoMpamBad","Mapping10K_Xba131.xda.genotyping.mpam.chp", test.testDir + "/foo.CDF");
00115 
00116     ///@todo regression test for "no-header" option
00117     ///@todo regression test for "no-body" option
00118     ///@todo regression test for "chp-files" option
00119 
00120 
00121     Verbose::out (1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr (test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr (test.numFailed));
00122     return test.numFailed != 0;
00123   }
00124   catch(...) {
00125       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00126       return 1;
00127   }
00128   return 1;
00129 }
